About

Welcome to my Blogs !


Hi there👋 I’m Akash Sharma , a programmer, researcher and a tech-enthusiast.

I’m passionate about solving problems through code🚀helping the world🌎 and making the lives of people 👨‍👨‍👧 around me easier!
